commit message: Don't use singleTask launch mode for PostsActivity since it is the main activity. Should fix #505
Added a check for NullPointer Exception in getCode. Fixes #506.
Don't use any special launchModes for menu drawer activities. Since we created a PagesActivity this shouldn't be needed any longer. Refs #505.
Post Editor: Added padding to content edit box so that text is not displayed under the formatting bar when typing.
Adding try/catch to catch SQLiteException when attempting to create the wpDB. Still not sure why this is happening but at least users won't get a f/c. Fixes #507.
Make sure fragment activity is not null before updating progress. Fixes #512
Use the getter for currentBlog to make sure we have the last blog selected. Fixes #508
check for a null parent activity before showing alert dialog. Fixes #509
Make sure parent activity is not null. Fixes #511
